name: Iron Invasion
description:
Become a famous Scrapper as you blast through robot invaders alone or with friends. Collect Scrap and Schematics to update your gear and express yourself with a variety of different cosmetics. Join our Scrapper community:  https://discord.gg/rY9m3Bc8h3 More weapons and missions coming soon!

Game made by: 

Keppu (Antti Koponen) – Lead Game Designer, Lead Artist and Sound Designer

Peljätty Miksu – Lead Programmer

Harizio – Programmer

kuljake (Jarkko Kulha) - Programmer

NANIMOON – Artist

Jarsa (Jari Räisänen) – Producer & Game Designer

In collaboration with

Kajak Games

Special thanks to EXPLOSIVES

CC-content used from users: 

Witchersilver - Microphone 

Antropy - SciFi Soccerball 

Truedarkdev - DDPathfinder
